attributes.action: Increase the defence budget and stop cutting troop and ship numbers
attributes.additional_details: Please note I did not write these articles. Royal Navy Ship numbers: http://www.savetheroyalnavy.org/royal-navy-warship-numbers-falling-off-a-cliff/
attributes.background: After the 2010 defence review more and more cuts have been made to the military. The Navy has some of its lowest ship numbers and the Army is smaller than ever. If we as a country want to remain strong we must increase the defence budget to a sensible amount that will benefit the armed forces.
